actions.text: Referred to House Committee on International Relations.

official_title: Concurrent resolution expressing the sense of Congress with respect to the renewal of relations between the United States and Cuba.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Expresses the sense of Congress that the United States should give due attention to human rights principles as set forth in the Universal Declaration of Human Rights in considering renewal of diplomatic or economic relations with Cuba.

titles.title: Concurrent resolution expressing the sense of Congress with respect to the renewal of relations between the United States and Cuba.
